user_query: I'm planning a trip to Canada and I need to convert my US Dollars to Canadian Dollars. Can you provide me with the current conversion rate for 1000 USD to CAD? Additionally, fetch the historical rates for USD on September 1, 2021 and display the rates for different currencies.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current conversion rate for 1000 USD to CAD.
Fetch the historical conversion rates for USD on September 1, 2021.
Display the historical rates for different currencies based on the fetched historical data.
